mapper.insert: insert into DEBIT_TRAN_INFO (CHANNEL_SEQ, CHANNEL_NO, CHANNEL_DATE, TXN_DATE, TELLER_SEQ, TXN_STATUS, PLATFORM_DATE, PLATFORM_SEQ, TXN_CODE, TXN_ORG, TXN_TELLER, TXN_CUR, PAY_ACCOUNT, RECEIVE_ACCOUNT, TXN_AMOUNT, RESERVED1, PAGY_SYS_NO, PAGY_NO, CHK_DATA_DT, CHK_ACCT_ST, CHK_RST, LST_UPD_TM,DUBIOUS_FLAG) values (#{channelSeq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{channelNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{channelDate,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{txnDate,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{tellerSeq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{txnStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{platformDate,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{platformSeq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{txnCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{txnOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{txnTeller,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{txnCur,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiveAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{txnAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{reserved1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pagySysNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{pagyNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{chkDataDt,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{chkAcctSt,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{chkRst,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{lstUpdTm,jdbcType=CHAR},#{dubiousFlag,jdbcType=CHAR})

mapper.update:
update DEBIT_TRAN_INFO
CHANNEL_NO = #{channelNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHANNEL_DATE = #{channelDate,jdbcType=CHAR},
TXN_DATE = #{txnDate,jdbcType=CHAR},
TELLER_SEQ = #{tellerSeq,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TXN_STATUS = #{txnStatus,jdbcType=CHAR},
PLATFORM_DATE = #{platformDate,jdbcType=CHAR},
PLATFORM_SEQ = #{platformSeq,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TXN_CODE = #{txnCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TXN_ORG = #{txnOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TXN_TELLER = #{txnTeller,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TXN_CUR = #{txnCur,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAY_ACCOUNT = #{payAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RECEIVE_ACCOUNT = #{receiveAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TXN_AMOUNT = #{txnAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
RESERVED1 = #{reserved1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAGY_SYS_NO = #{pagySysNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
PAGY_NO = #{pagyNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
CHK_DATA_DT = #{chkDataDt,jdbcType=CHAR},
CHK_ACCT_ST = #{chkAcctSt,jdbcType=CHAR},
CHK_RST = #{chkRst,jdbcType=CHAR},
LST_UPD_TM = #{lstUpdTm,jdbcType=CHAR},
DUBIOUS_FLAG = #{dubiousFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
where CHANNEL_SEQ = #{channelSeq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update DEBIT_TRAN_INFO set CHANNEL_NO = #{channelNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHANNEL_DATE = #{channelDate,jdbcType=CHAR}, TXN_DATE = #{txnDate,jdbcType=CHAR}, TELLER_SEQ = #{tellerSeq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TXN_STATUS = #{txnStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, PLATFORM_DATE = #{platformDate,jdbcType=CHAR}, PLATFORM_SEQ = #{platformSeq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TXN_CODE = #{txnCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TXN_ORG = #{txnOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TXN_TELLER = #{txnTeller,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TXN_CUR = #{txnCur,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAY_ACCOUNT = #{payAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RECEIVE_ACCOUNT = #{receiveAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TXN_AMOUNT = #{txnAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RESERVED1 = #{reserved1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAGY_SYS_NO = #{pagySysNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, PAGY_NO = #{pagyNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, CHK_DATA_DT = #{chkDataDt,jdbcType=CHAR}, CHK_ACCT_ST = #{chkAcctSt,jdbcType=CHAR}, CHK_RST = #{chkRst,jdbcType=CHAR}, LST_UPD_TM = #{lstUpdTm,jdbcType=CHAR}, DUBIOUS_FLAG = #{dubiousFlag,jdbcType=CHAR} where CHANNEL_SEQ = #{channelSeq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.delete: delete from DEBIT_TRAN_INFO where CHK_DATA_DT = #{settleDate,jdbcType=CHAR} and PAGY_SYS_NO is not null
mapper.select:
select
from DEBIT_TRAN_INFO where CHK_DATA_DT = #{settleDate} and PAGY_SYS_NO is not null

select
from DEBIT_TRAN_INFO where CHK_DATA_DT = #{doubtDate} and CHK_RST= #{chkSt} and PAGY_SYS_NO is not null

select
from DEBIT_TRAN_INFO where CHK_DATA_DT = #{settleDate} and CHK_ACCT_ST= #{state} and PAGY_SYS_NO is not null

select
from DEBIT_TRAN_INFO where CHK_DATA_DT = #{settleDate} and PAGY_SYS_NO is null

select
from DEBIT_TRAN_INFO where CHK_DATA_DT = #{doubtDate} and CHK_RST= #{chkSt} and PAGY_SYS_NO is null

select
from DEBIT_TRAN_INFO where CHK_DATA_DT = #{settleDate} and CHK_ACCT_ST= #{state} and PAGY_SYS_NO is null

select
from DEBIT_TRAN_INFO where CHK_DATA_DT = #{settleDate} and DUBIOUS_FLAG =#{dubiousFlag} and PAGY_SYS_NO is not null

select
from DEBIT_TRAN_INFO where CHK_DATA_DT = #{settleDate} and DUBIOUS_FLAG =#{dubiousFlag} and PAGY_SYS_NO is null
